mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_NAME, EMAIL, ROLE, OAUTH_PROVIDER, DLTN_YN, RGST_ID, RGST_DT, UPDT_ID, UPDT_DT FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND DLTN_YN = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_NAME, EMAIL, ROLE, OAUTH_PROVIDER, DLTN_YN, RGST_ID, RGST_DT, UPDT_ID, UPDT_DT) VALUES (#{memberNickname}, #{memberName}, #{email}, #{role}, #{oauthProvider}, #{dltnYn}, #{rgstId}, NOW(), #{updtId}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_NAME = #{memberName}, UPDT_ID = #{updtId}, UPDT_DT = NOW() WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
